Configuration.Name: L1=L2=4_offset_apx10_JM2017
Configuration.SetupScript:
config.wavelength = 5 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 3200 config.det_offset = 300 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g7' config.apx = -72 config.bs = 2 config.beamcenterx = 33.37 config.beamcenterz = 94.89
config.drive()
